p: We have previously optimized the SCO 2 extraction conditions and established a laboratory protocol for the CO fat extraction (Jelani et al., 2017). However, the extraction of CO fat was done based on the semi-pilot scale, and the optimized extraction condition was applied. In this study, CO fat was extracted from the CO pulp powder using the SCO 2 extractor. The extraction was done by the automated system with the heater set to 40Â°C and with an extraction pressure of 40 MPa.
